DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is the validation of the Brief Michigan Hand Questionnaire by patient with Morbus Dupuytren and to build up a register.
DOC.brief_title: Registry of Patient With M. Dupuytren and Validation of the Brief MHQ
DOC.detailed_description: examination of the characteristics of Patient with Morbus Dupuytren and the psychometric properties of the Brief Michigan Hand Questionnaire by this patients
DOC.criteria: M.Dupuytren, over 18y, able to speak and understand german recurrence, pregnancy, incapable of contracting
